definitions.text: an orange of low brightness and saturation
Scottish botanist who first observed the movement of small particles in fluids now known a Brownian motion (1773-1858)
abolitionist who was hanged after leading an unsuccessful raid at Harper's Ferry, Virginia (1800-1859)
fry in a pan until it changes color
examples: brown the meat in the pan
the draught browned the leaves on the trees in the yard

definitions.text: of a color similar to that of wood or earth
